WorkItem.Description: Could you provide me an example how to sync Sql Server Express with Sql CE 4.0 through WCF Data Services. Thanks in advance!

Comments.Message:
Hello in-v1rt

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service !   

Your sample request is about how to sync Sql Server Express with Sql CE 4.0 through WCF Data Services.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

We found the Sql CE 4.0 doesn't support the Sync framework. If you want use the Sync Framework, you can use the Sql CE 3.5. You can refer this link: http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg592946%28v=SQL.110%29.aspx.
If you want the Sql CE 3.5 sample, you can refer this link: http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Database-Sync-SQL-Server-7e88adab.

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
